paused.title: Resume paused backup
paused.description: You have paused a backup that isn't finished it yet.

default.title: No backups yet
default.description: You haven't created any backups yet. Create one by pressing the button below.

pending.title: Backup pending
pending.description: Another folder is currently being backed up. The initial backup for this folder is in the queue.

initial.title: Running initial backup
initial.description: This is the initial backup of this folder, so it may take a while. BlinkDisk only uploads changed files after this, making all future backups much faster and lighter.

canceling.title: Canceling backup
canceling.description: This backup is currently being canceled. The cancelation can take a while.

renameDialog.title: Rename backup
renameDialog.description: Give this backup a custom name to find it more easily.
renameDialog.label: Name

deleteDialog.title: Delete backup
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? This action cannot be undone.

alert.title: Cleanup happens over time
alert.description: Storage space won’t be freed instantly. BlinkDisk cleans up unused data later to ensure reliability.

alert.title: What are pins?
alert.description: When a backup has a pin, it won't be removed even if it falls outside your retention policy.
